attributes.additional_details: We would like funding or the ability to keep the ice rink open or provide us with a new rink that has been promised for many years, there is a strong skating community with figure skaters hockey skaters and many other people who enjoy the sport
attributes.background: Keep the only ice rink in Devon and Cornwall open or provide a new ice rink

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about closure of ice rinks are a matter for their operators and the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
